title: Analyze Audience Engagement Funnel
description: An analyst wants to see how many people who see a story on social media actually click the link, and then how long they stay on the page.

tasks.description: Retrieve the 'impressions' and 'clicks' data for a specific story from the social media platform's analytics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the top-of-funnel social media data.

tasks.description: In the web analytics platform, find the corresponding article and look at the 'average time on page' for traffic coming from that social media source.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the on-site engagement data.

tasks.description: Combine the data to report on the full engagement funnel (e.g., '10,000 impressions led to 500 clicks, with an average time on page of 90 seconds').
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete picture of the engagement funnel is created.
